metadata.title: CVE-2015-2674 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Restkit allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof TLS servers byleveraging use of the ssl.wrap_socket function in Python with the defaultCERT_NONE value for the cert_reqs argument.

criterions.comment: python-restkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
